mapper.sql: id, treatment, payment_method AS paymentMethod, membership_card AS membershipCard, payment_amount AS paymentAmount, member_rating AS memberRating, foreground_rating AS foregroundRating, technician_rating AS technicianRating, manager_rating AS managerRating, status,created_by AS createdBy, member, department, create_time AS createTime, flag, transfer_card_consumption AS transferCardConsumption, transfer_amount As transferAmount
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) c FROM member_settlement ms LEFT JOIN treatment t ON t.id = ms.treatment WHERE exists(SELECT 1 FROM treatment tt WHERE tt.id = #{tid} AND t.user_id = tt.user_id)
SELECT mc.discount, d.price_standard pstd FROM treatment t LEFT JOIN membership_card mc ON t.user_id = mc.user LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.id = t.department WHERE t.id = #{tid}
SELECT mc.balance FROM treatment t LEFT JOIN membership_card mc ON t.user_id = mc.user WHERE t.id = #{tid}
SELECT * FROM member_settlement ms LEFT JOIN treatment t ON t.id = ms.treatment AND t.department = #{did} WHERE t.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ms.create_time DESC
SELECT m.real_name FROM member_settlement ms LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id = ms.member WHERE (m.real_name is not null) and m.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
SELECT m.real_name FROM member_settlement ms LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id = ms.member where (m.real_name is not null)
